title: Hishokon
sinopse:
To become a secretary, Aya changed job and got an interview. The one who is a director in the company is a handsome man, Takara! "I've met my destiny!" Aya's heart squeezed when director Takara asked her "do you want to be my servant?" and without really thinking Aya answered "I'll do anything!" !?

(Source: Chibi Manga)
